data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Bissau, Guinea-Bissau to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bissau, Guinea-Bissau

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Bissau, Guinea-Bissau humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Bissau.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 8,070 believers in Bissau, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Fula Jalon people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Bissau, Guinea-Bissau.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bissau who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bissau, Guinea-Bissau has a population of 388,100.

We estimate Bissau has 8,070 people who might know Jesus, 37,289 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 342,741 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Bissau unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Bissau
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Papel, Balanta, Kentohe, Nalu, Nalu
